action.text: SA 5137 fell when cloture invoked on the motion to concur in the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 4346 with an amendment (SA 5135).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 5137 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S3362; text: CR S3496) To add an effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5137 proposed by Senator Schumer.
